extendedInfo.description: EmoCube is a personal diary that helps you keep track of your emotions along your life and share them with your friends.Features:* Stylish application* Large set of emoticons* Twitter and Facebook share* Online Backup/Restore* Photo attachment* Daily reminder* StatisticsFull descriptionWith EmoCube mobile app you can write your diary wherever you are capturing moments of your lifetime. A stylish and lightweight interface coupled with a large set of emoticons (smiles, emoji), allows you to quickly memorize your moods and feelings.Take snapshot or attach a photo to your notes to hold your moments.Secure your diary with a passcode to avoid malicious eyes looking at your private notes.Backup your diary on EmoCube.com site and restore them in any moment on any Android device.EmoCube lets you decide what to make public or keep private. Once your Twitter and Facebook accounts have been registered in the application settings, you can post updates to those social networks with one click. Notes can also be sent via mail or SMS.After you have stored all your notes you can browse and search them within the mobile application. Several statistics are also available to analyze your mood history. EmoCube associates each mood to a specific color based on an emotional palette. Generate your EmoStrip to represent the latest moods in a colored bar. Share it with your friends and have fun!Keywords: diary, journal, note, memo, notepad, emoticon, smiles.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried many diary apps noth reall think that if you are reading this you should get this diary app because the other ones I tried have a virus that mess up my phone or it has just weird things that I don\'t like feeling I think this would be a great choice for any girl or a boy can you get to choose your mood and is it a ride what you want you don\'t even have to share it if you don\'t want to but you could and has a date is just awesome setup so he get a chance anyone else and diarrhea app this is perfect
reviews.author: S\'vana Edwards

reviews.title: Good concept
reviews.comment: It\'s ok, but I think that It\'s a bit limited. I think something like neggymeter is more useful and interesting.

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I find this to be perfect. I suffer from fibromyalgia and PTSD and this ist he perfect way to record everything for doctors. Its handy. You can write what you feel instead of checking pre determined boxes and add as many as you need to to cover your entire day. This is worth it!
reviews.author: Jessica Buchmelter

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The truth is I really got this so I could write down my life story and right now its going great. I don\'t care if you can only write 1000 words because I have a perfect ending for each page.
